isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built Before 05/20/2003 - ELECTRONIC GAUGE CLUSTER AND AUXILIARY GAUGE SWITCH PACK - REMOVE AND INSTALL - EGC PANEL LAMPS AND GAUGE BACKLIGHTING LAMPS

svcproc.title: EGC PANEL LAMPS AND GAUGE BACKLIGHTING LAMPS
svcproc.para: The EGC panel lamps are twist in lamps. To replace the lamps the failed lamp must be removed and replaced with a good lamp.

item.para: Remove the EGC from the instrument panel.
Remove six screws holding the back of the EGC in place and remove the back cover.
Locate the failed lamp and remove it by twisting it out of the circuit board.
Replace the removed lamp with a good twist in indicator lamp.
